name: Solar Batteryman
description: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Thunder monster from your Deck to the GY. If a Thunder monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Batteryman Token" (Thunder/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can target 1 Effect Monster you control or in your GY whose original name includes "Batteryman"; until the End Phase, this card's name becomes that monster's original name. You can only use each effect of "Solar Batteryman" once per turn.
